title: Paying tribute to Dr. David Conti upon the occasion of his designation for special honor by the National Kidney Foundation of Northeast New York
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION paying tribute to Dr. David Conti upon the occa-
sion of his designation for special honor by the National Kidney Founda-
tion of Northeast New York

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize  and  pay
tribute  to  those  individuals within the medical field who distinguish
themselves through professional excellence and who have made significant
contributions to the quality of life of citizens in  the  State  of  New
York; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative Body is justly proud to pay tribute to Dr.
David Conti, upon the occasion of his designation for special  honor  by
the  National  Kidney Foundation of Northeast New York, to be celebrated
at its 200 Liters Campaign reception on Thursday, February 3,  2011,  at
the Desmond Hotel, Albany, New York; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Honorary Chair of this year's Campaign, Dr. David Conti
is the Director of Albany Medical Center's Transplant  Program;  he  has
given  not  only  of  his  time and energies but also of his competence,
intelligence and leadership and consequently  has  been  designated  for
special honor; and
  WHEREAS, Having completed his medical degree, internship, and residen-
cy at Northwestern University in Chicago, Illinois, Dr. David Conti then
continued  by  completing two fellowships, one in Transplant Surgery and
the other in Surgery, both at Massachusetts General Hospital in  Boston,
Massachusetts; and
  WHEREAS,  Today, Dr. David Conti is a nationally recognized transplant
surgeon and a leading researcher in the field of transplant  immunology;
and
  WHEREAS,  This  remarkable  doctor  specializes  in renal and pancreas
transplant patients, and vascular access for dialysis, as well as gener-
al surgery; and
  WHEREAS, As Director of Albany Medical Center's transplant  team,  Dr.
David  Conti  has  been  instrumental  in  contributing to the excellent
patient and transplant graft outcomes that are some of  the  highest  in
the Nation; and
  WHEREAS,  As  a  leader  in his profession, Dr. David Conti has proven
himself to be a great asset to medicine and to the health and welfare of
the citizens of the State of New York; and
  WHEREAS, It is the custom of this  Legislative  Body  to  commend  and
recognize  those  esteemed  individuals within the medical community for
their extraordinary and sustained contributions to the progress of medi-
cine and the improvement of life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause in its deliberations to pay
tribute to Dr. David Conti upon the  occasion  of  his  designation  for
special  honor  by the National Kidney Foundation of Northeast New York;
and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Dr. David Conti.
